title: Fire, straight fire.
text:
Ignore negative reviews on here. This app is fire.

As a free user (non premium) I could not be more satisfied. I can convert currencies on the spot as needed, no fee. I can have foreign bank accounts on the spot and transfer money in different countries as if I had a local account, no fee. I top up on the spot, no fee. As someone who travels and lives abroad a lot, this app has COMPLETELY revolutionized the way I deal with my finances. 

I had my stripe cloned somewhere and the app automatically negated the attempted transactions from whomever had cloned it, and suggested I block the card. They sent me a new one at no cost.

Revolut is the bomb. Screw banks.

title: Simple way to avoid US outdated banking system.
text: Fees like us banking system is so outdated and behind eu real-time transactions. Finally game changer that will shake the market. So simple yet powerful. No account fees, no exchange fees. Simply debit card that works everywhere without international fees (Chase charged me percent per transaction when I am in EU - never again!)

I then asked if I could close my account and have my data deleted and was told no as I had a 6 cents negative balance and that they would keep my data for 5 years.  No recognition of GDPR there!

title: Massive Wait Times ‚Äî Use Wise Instead
text:
Revolut is not a revolutionary concept. It‚Äôs simple what Wise and other providers have been successfully offering for years. They just market to a younger demographic. 

Now ad hominem aside, their transfer times are horrendously slow. With a bank transfer make before cutoff on 10/31 I still haven‚Äôt received the $100 transfer on 11/6. This is right at their maximum ‚Äú2-4 business day limit‚Äù which is just so slow. 

They‚Äôre not given priority or something else.

Wise is IMMEDIATE. 

When dealing with transferring money and being abroad‚Ä¶ users need money FAST. Not THIS slow. 

The customer service procedure is a laundry list of questions before you can ever speak to a representative. 

I do NOT recommend this service at this time. Stick with wise.

To add to the dismay, I awoke one day to find my card cancelled without prior notice, a bewildering move linked to a ‚Äòfree metal upgrade‚Äô offered months before.
